titles.title: Wider Incentives for Non-Gasoline Small Electric Vehicles Act of 2002
WINGS EV Act of 2002
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the electric motor vehicle credit, including an expansion of the credit to certain 3-wheeled vehicles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/24/2002--Introduced. Wider Incentives for Non-Gasoline Small Electric Vehicles Act of 2002 or the WINGS EV Act of 2002 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, concerning the electric motor vehicle credit, to: (1) redefine the term "qualified electric vehicle"; (2) increase the credit according to vehicle type; (3) make the credit available for leased vehicles and three wheeled vehicles; and (4) extend the credit three additional years.
